sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { View, ScrollView, Image, TextInput, Text} from 'react-native';

import css from "./Style"
import { Feather } from '@expo/vector-icons';

export default function CadastrarFuncionario({navigation}){
    return(
        <View style={css.body}>
            <Image style={css.image} source={require("../assets/logo.png")}/>
            <View style={css.scrollView}>
                <ScrollView>
                    <TextInput placeholder="Nome..." place style={css.info}></TextInput>
                    <TextInput placeholder="RG..." style={css.info}></TextInput>
                    <TextInput placeholder="CPF..." style={css.info}></TextInput>
                    <TextInput placeholder="Nascimento..." style={css.info}></TextInput>
                    <TextInput placeholder="Cargo..." style={css.info}></TextInput>
                    <TextInput placeholder="Sexo..." style={css.info}></TextInput>
                    <TextInput placeholder="Data admissÃ£o..." style={css.info}></TextInput>
                    <View style={{flexDirection: "row", alignSelf: "center", marginTop: "5%"}}>
                        <View style={{width:100, height:100, backgroundColor: "#C4C4C4", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center"}}>
                            <Text>Foto</Text>
                        </View>
                        <View style={{
                            width: 200,
                            height: 100,
                            flexDirection: "column",
                            alignItems: "center",
                            justifyContent: "center"}}>
                            <Feather name="camera" size={24} color="blue" />
                            <Text style={{color: "blue"}}>Adicionar foto</Text>
                        </View>
                    </View>
                    <Text style={{
                        color:"blue",
                        fontSize: 20,
                        fontWeight: "bold",
                        alignSelf: "center",
                        marginTop: "5%"}}>Salvar</Text>
                </ScrollView>
            </View>
        </View>
    )
}
